text: Iron Man is a 1951 American drama movie directed by Joseph Pevney and is the second adaption of the 1930 novel of the same name by W. R. Burnett. It stars Jeff Chandler, Evelyn Keyes, Stephen McNally, Rock Hudson, Joyce Holden, Jim Backus and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph Pevney
title: Iron Man (1951 movie)
